data.title: Friday, June 7, 2024
data.meta_description: Friday JTV News presents The Morning Show.  Today, Andy and Bart’s guests: Dan  Draper, Principal, Jackson Area Career Center.  Tina Mercier and Chloe Mietelka,
data.text:
Friday JTV News presents The Morning Show.Today, Andy and Bart’s guests: Dan Draper, Principal, Jackson Area Career Center. Tina Mercier and Chloe Mietelka, Gus Macker Jackson. Deputy Nick Warner, Marine Patrol Division, Jackson County Sheriff’s Department. 9 AM and 11 AM. Replay from June 4.

Friday on The Bart Hawley Show: Matt Aubin, Director of Music, Jackson Symphony Orchestra; Joe Cecil, Student Statesmanship Institute; Hannah Schauer, Executive Director & Carrie Benham, Naturalist Educator, Dahlem; Travis Fojtasek, The Green Market. Live at 1 PM, replays at 5, 8 and 11 PM; 2 and 5 AM. Replay from June 4.

Food Circus: All new episode! Traveling chef from Taher, Tony Menk visits Middle School at Parkside and Jackson High. Along with the culinary team from JPS, they team up to make a fabulous Mongolian Grill lunch for students to enjoy.

True Story: TRUE STORY highlights the birthplace of the Republican Party in Jackson. Kathleen Thorrez, Bruce Barton, David VanHoof and others talk about Jackson’s past.

The Jackson Show: Interviews and Highlights from the 2023 ETA Festival presented by Jackson Young Professionals in downtown Jackson.

At Home Jackson:

American Title Company – What is title insurance and how does that affect you as a homeowner? American Title Company owner Ron Ellison joins us with details including what to talk to your REALTOR about before the closing.

MLL Insurance – You may be wondering why the cost of insurance is rising and Chris Cook with MLL Insurance joins us in studio to share his insight and discuss your home insurance coverage options.

Skylar Harris, The Brokerage House – Whether you are looking to buy or sell a home, you’ll want to work with the REALTOR that is best for you. Join us as we introduce you to Skylar Harris with the Brokerage House to hear what she offers her clients in this exciting market.

JTV Sports Vault: We look back at highlights from Napoleon’s 2023 football season with wins over Onsted in Week 1 and Week 7 vs Michigan Center.
